react-gpt.title: React GPT
react-gpt.description: A client for ChatGPT, made with React and TailwindCSS. It works using the OpenAI API and the gpt3.5-turbo model.

css-background-generator.title: CSS plasma background generator
css-background-generator.description: A plasma background generator written in Javascript. Ideal for generating a background for your web, or practicing with CSS animations and gradients.

ngrx-express-boilerplate.title: Angular + Express boilerplate
ngrx-express-boilerplate.description: An Angular + Express boilerplate to create web applications with a NodeJS backend. It also includes Angular Material, NgRx and Jest.

vite-react-express.title: Vite + React + Express boilerplate
vite-react-express.description: A Vite + React + Express boilerplate to create web applications with a NodeJS backend. It also includes ESLint and Prettier.

porkbun-ddns-updater.title: Porkbun dynamic DNS updater
porkbun-ddns-updater.description: Python script to update Porkbun DNS dynamically. Ideal for having a server at home and accessing it from the internet.

hik-script.title: HIKScript
hik-script.description: Python script to detect and exploit the ICSA-17-124-01 vulnerability, also known as Hikvision Camera Backdoor.

about.greeting: Hi! My name is <1>Francisco</1> and I'm a <1>frontend</1> developer.

who-am-i.title: Who am I?
who-am-i.p1: I'm Francisco Cerd√°n (Paco, for friends üòÅ), I'm {{age}} years old and I'm from a small town in the interior of Alicante.
who-am-i.p2: I'm currently working as a frontend developer at <2>Nomasystems</2> and I love learning new things and sharing knowledge.

what-do-i-do.title: What do I do?
what-do-i-do.p1: I'm currently working on the development of frontends for applications in the private sector with Angular and React. My main design technology is TDD (Karma, Jest), I am familiar with reactive programming (RxJS), and also work daily with the Redux pattern react-redux, NgRx, Akita).

after-work.title: After work
after-work.p1: In my free time I also like to train and do small projects that have to do with technology, such as the small software laboratory that I have at home and is the reason for being of this website. In it, I like to tinker with Docker and set up my own Git, CI / CD and documentation services, so as not to limit myself only to create code.
after-work.p2: I'm also a big fan of everything related to cybersecurity and artificial intelligence, and I dedicate time to research on these topics.
